Mitigation.Textual:
The following curves were added to the server configuration:{add}
Remove the following curves from the server configuration:{remove}
Mitigation.Apache: These elements are managed by the SSLOpenSSLConfCmd groups directive, with : serving as separator and removing an element to disable it.
Mitigation.nginx: These elements are managed by the ssl_ecdh_curve directive, with : serving as separator and removing an element to disable it.
Mitigation.Missing: The following curves/groups are not supported by the current OpenSSL version: {missing_elements}.

< 1.0.2.Textual: NOTE: OpenSSL version < 1.0.2 can only use one curve at a time. If you want to use multiple curves, you must upgrade OpenSSL to version 1.0.2 or higher.

1024-long DH.Apache:
Run the following command to generate 1024 bits DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 >> /path/to/cert.
To remove 1024 bits DH keys run the following command: sed -i '/BEGIN DH PARAMETERS/,/END DH PARAMETERS/d' /path/to/cert.
1024-long DH.nginx:
Run the following command to generate 1024 bits DH parameters: openssl dhparam 1024 %gt; /path/to/dhparams.
To remove 1024 bits DH keys disable the directive ssl_dhparam.
